General.Name: Triunfo Participações e Investimentos S.A
General.Description: Triunfo Participações e Investimentos S.A., through its subsidiaries, engages in the infrastructure business in Brazil. It provides toll road concessionaires, highway operation, upkeep, and maintenance services. The company also offers monitoring and pavement evaluation services; and airport management services. In addition, it engages in the operation and maintenance of hydroelectric power plants. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil. Triunfo Participações e Investimentos S.A. is a subsidiary of THP - Triunfo Holding de Participações S.A.
General.Address: Rua Olimpíadas, no 205, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04551-000
